Name: Student Solutions Manual, Volume 1 for Serway/Jewett's Physics for Scientists and Engineers, 8th

ReviewList.Text: For the price, there is no way that this solutions manual is worth it. While the explainations are good, it only gives the explainations for a few choice problems, and those problems are the easy ones that you don't need help with. If you're looking for an answer key to help you figure out how to work out various settings this is not the right book. DO NOT BUY IT.
students should consider getting this right away when they order the book itself.  It is more than solutions. It is also sort of like a sparks notes for each chapter, with lots of study helps.

I had a less than awesome teacher, so I was forced to depend upon the book, solution manual, and youtube videos to understand the content. If you have no instruction on how the physics works, it is more than a little frustrating because the solution manual does NOT provide answers for every odd question. It picks one question out of each section and answers it. That was annoying. Like I said as far as a physics book goes, it is ok, but without outside resources such as a teacher haha, it will take a great deal of time and work. The condition of the book itself though was excellent, and there were no problems in recieving it.

This student solutions manual is awful.  Most solutions manuals show full solutions for odd numbered problems, but not this book, they only have random answers to odd numbered questions, so maybe only every 5th odd-numbered question will have an answer in this book.  This is not worth what you have to pay for it.

Like others have stated, only gives explanations to a few (VERY FEW_) problems, and surprise, they're never the ones you want. Just ask your professor and save a chunk of change. This book sucks donkey balls. Utterly worthless.
It appears to be good but I did not use it since the professor used his own problems.  Also, I really did not have any need to get help with my questions so this book was never used.
Not much else to say other than it's a solution manual. If you don't understand how to completely a problem it worked well.
it gives step by step information on who to solve the problems.  they are specific ones from the book.  it helped me a lot!
This was exactly what was needed for the college course.  Exactly as described in the ad. Thanks so much.  Me

I find that the problems have very detailed explanations. I would like to see more problems treated in this manner than just a subset of the book. I still think this is a useful manual for studying and mastering physics. I use it in my tutoring sessions.
Love love love this book!  I'll be buying the second one for sure!!!  The best thing was...it came really fast!!!
This book was even better than described.  It arrived when promised and was exactly what my child wanted.  We would order from here again.
